channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: What’s worth streaming on Netflix, Max, Hulu and more in February 2025 — and which subscriptions to pause or stop
item.description: ‘The White Lotus,’ ‘Yellowjackets’ and ‘Invincible’ are back for new seasons, while Robert De Niro stars in Netflix’s ‘Zero Day’

item.title: My stepfather’s children told me they plan to buy the house he shares with my mother. I stopped them in their tracks.
item.description: “I discovered that the default deed in Illinois is tenants in common — not joint tenants with the right of survivorship.”

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: ‘I kept my finances totally separate in my first marriage’: I’m getting hitched again. This time we’re combining our assets. Is that bad?
item.description: ”I kept my finances totally separate in my first 20-plus year marriage — and I’m going to do it differently this time.”

item.title: ‘I’ve dealt with verbal, emotional and financial abuse for many years’: I’m 48 and my husband is 84. I need a job and want out of this marriage.
item.description: “I worked in a remote call center for almost five years and applied for 25 positions without a callback.”

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: Trump launches trade war on Canada, Mexico and China, leaving investors to pay the ‘chaos premium’
